description: Isle of Man members of a teaching union are now refusing to cover classes for absent colleagues.
title: Isle of Man teachers step up industrial action in ongoing dispute
title_page: Isle of Man teachers step up industrial action in ongoing dispute - BBC News
maintext: However, students from different year groups and subjects may have to be placed in the same room for part of the school day to ensure they can be "adequately managed" in the event of teacher absences, the head said.
